About

Welcome to Dong Li's blog. I am a Full Stack Software Developer currently working in General Electric located in San Ramon, CA.

This website contains some projects I have been working with and some articles I used to summarize the knowledge I have learned. Feel free to contact me for anything you find interesting :)

Project 1

Project 2

A chat messenger that supports Facebook/Twitter authentication and utilizes socket.io for real time streaming functionality. The app can be visited here

Project 3

A stock monitor app built entirely on AngularJS. It uses JSONP method to send asynchronous request to Yahoo Finance API for the latest stock price and other related information. Visited here to play around with it. (This app is from Professional AngularJS book).

  • Date: May 2016

Project 4

A tiny Twitter prototype app built in Rails. a very good resource for those who interested in learning Rails. It uses TDD for the whole development. The app can be seen here. (This app is from Ruby on Rails Tutorial)

  • Date: Nov 2016
